snippet: The Ukrainian government said Saturday that it had pushed pro-Russian fighters out of Slovyansk, a long-blockaded rebel stronghold where some of the fiercest fighting has occurred during the more than three-month separatist insurrection.
abstract: Ukrainian government forces expel pro-Russian insurgents from Slovyansk, long-blockaded rebel stronghold; in retaking Slovyansk, Ukrainian forces are finally gaining traction and reasserting state authority in eastern Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The Ukrainian government said Saturday that it had pushed pro-Russian fighters out of Slovyansk, a long-blockaded rebel stronghold where some of the fiercest fighting has occurred during the more than three-month separatist insurrection.

headline.main: Pro-Russian Fighters Routed From Stronghold, Ukraine Says
headline.print_headline: Rebel Bastion Swiftly Overrun in East Ukraine
